content.rendered:
Documentation for all available field types in Secure Custom Fields.

Each field type has its own documentation and tutorial showing how to implement and use it effectively.

Available Fields

  • Accordion – Group fields into collapsible sections
  • Button Group – Select one option from a group of buttons
  • Checkbox – Select one or more choices
  • Clone – Duplicate and reuse existing field configurations
  • Color Picker – Choose colors with a visual picker
  • Date Picker – Select dates from a calendar
  • Date/Time Picker – Select dates and times
  • Email – Input and validate email addresses
  • File – Upload and manage files
  • Flexible Content – Create flexible content layouts
  • Gallery – Manage collections of images
  • Google Map – Add location data with Google Maps
  • Group – Group fields together
  • Icon Picker – Select from available icons
  • Image – Upload and manage images
  • Link – Create links with titles and targets
  • Message – Display instructional text
  • Number – Input numeric values
  • oEmbed – Embed external content
  • Page Link – Link to internal content
  • Password – Securely input passwords
  • Post Object – Relate to other posts
  • Radio – Select one choice from options
  • Range – Select a numeric value with a slider
  • Repeater – Create repeatable groups of fields
  • Select – Choose from dropdown options
  • Separator – Add visual breaks between fields
  • Tab – Organize fields into tabbed sections
  • Taxonomy – Select taxonomy terms
  • Text – Single line text input
  • Textarea – Multi-line text input
  • Time Picker – Select time values
  • True/False – Toggle switch for yes/no choices
  • URL – Input and validate web addresses
  • User – Select WordPress users
  • WYSIWYG – Rich text editor
